comment._content: Headed downtown on what's now Union Square East

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Maorlando: Your "theory" falls down as soon as one reads the licence plate in the photo: the photo obviously is not inverted. (This is 1914; steering wheel placement was not standardized until later.)

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
George Grantham Bain, the man "driving" the Stutz, was the head of the Bain News Agency, and the agency's office was in one of the highrise buildings facing Union Square, in New York City -- which is visible in these photos.

Other Bain/LOC photos of GG Bain in his Stutz:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5642877605/in/photostream/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5642877465/in/photostream/]
